full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BCOM LDAN 'DAS SMAN BLA'I SGRUB THABS MDOR BSDUS BZHUGS SO, ,BCOM LDAN 'DAS SMAN BLA BDE BAR GSHEGS PA BRGYAD KYI LHO SGO SGO NAS LHO SGO TSE 'DAS RJES SU 'DZIN TSUL BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @003A *, ,(CES SANGS RGYAS SMAN BLA'I SGRUB THABS MDOR BSDUS KHYER 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES YONGS RDZOGS BSTAN PA'I GSAL BYED CHEN PO DZA YA PAndI TA'I GSUNG GIS BSKUL BA LTAR SNYOMS LAS PA BLO BZANG MING CAN GYIS SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI BKRA SHIS RGYAL MTSAN NO, ,'DIS KYANG RGYAL BA BLO BZANG GRAGS PA'I BSTAN PA DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,MANGGA LAm, ,DGE'O, ,)
